result.rationale: The species is endemic to Taita hills, Kenya, where it has an extent of occurrence (EOO) of 91–193 km² and a current area of occupancy(AOO) of 16 km². It remains extant at three threat defined locations; Chawia Forest, Ngangao Forest and Mbololo Forest fragments. There is ongoing decline in quality and extent of habitat as a result of threats ranging from clearing of  indigenous forest trees and shrubs for firewood, building poles and  forest fires. Extended drought periods are also a threat. The species is assessed as Endangered under criterion B (EN B1ab(iii)+2ab(iii)).
result.geographicrange: The species is restricted to the indigenous forest fragments of Taita Hills Kenya, part of Eastern Arc Mountains (Larsen 1996, Wagura 2014, Kioko et al. 2021). The species has occurrence records from Chawia Forest, Mbololo Forest and Ngangao Forest.
result.population: The current population trend is not studied. However, studies done in 2017 - 2018 recorded 67 observations of the species along the forest edge in Ngangao forest (Mwinzi, 2019).
result.habitat: Cymothoe teita is a montane forest species restricted to indigenous forest fragments in Taita Hills (Larsen 1996, Mwinzi 2019, Kioko et al., 2021). Larval host plant is Dasylepis integra, endemic to Eastern Arc Mountains (Thijs et al. 2014, Congdon et al. 2017).
result.threats: This species has subpopulations both within protected area and outside protected areas. Two subpopulations (Ngangao Forest and Mbololo Forest) are under Kenya Forest Service protection. Chawia Forest is under local community protection. The forest fragments are facing threats ranging from clearing of indigenous forest trees and shrubs for firewood, building poles and forest fires. Extended drought periods are also a threat (Wilson et al. 2011, GoK 2018).
result.conservationmeasures: The Mbololo Forest and Ngangao Forest are protected under Forest conservation and management Act, 2016 (No. 34 of 2016). There is need for research on the impacts of current land uses on the population trend.
result.usetrade: Cymothoe teita is sometimes traded on order (www.kipepeo.org/price-list/).
